casebody.data:
ROMAN CATHOLIC CHURCH OF the DIOCESE OF BATON ROUGE, et al., petitioners,
v.
Robert D. MAYEUX, et ux. No. 14-220. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 20, 2015.

Opinion

Motion of The Confraternity of Catholic Clergy for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Louisiana denied.
